oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Teen Town dance, 1956 November 01
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of a dance for teenagers. This photo ran in the 01 November 1956 issue of the Nashville Banner with the headline, "Teen Town Teening." The caption read, "Guitarist David Monks and dancers Tommy Worral, Linda Northern, Patsy Mince, George Abrams, Brenda Davis, Lanier Rawls, Myrl Love and Wayne Roberts find the music and the company just right at Teen Town, held at the American Legion Post 5 Clubhouse 120 Ninth Avenue South. Music was furnished by the Teen Quintet Band. The Teen Town meetings are attracting a growing number of the high school set." Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 3x 4in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Monks, David; Worral, Tommy; Northern, Linda; Mince, Patsy; Abrams, George; Davis, Brenda; Rawls, Lanier; Love, Myrl; Roberts, Wayne
